lenders.name: Janaka
lenders.loan_because:
Dear All
Please visit our site and see our progress.
I need to provide a Personal Computer to all of our members of my village.
Please help us to buy computers. (one PC = $1100)
We can repay it; we hope to collect money by arranging raffles and showing stage drama and etc.
lenders.occupational_info:
Our organisation started for underprivileged students in order to develop skills in English and IT.
A few years later the organisation’s objectives widened to provide some very needy students
with personal computers and a small monthly amount for their studies. We are now happy to say
that ICTA and the government have nominated our village as an e-village. Our members are very
young students and they are developing small softwares, and our web-site and a few more other
websites are maintained by them. The founder, treasurer and chairman are there for the
management and financial side, but the organisation is basically run by the students themselves.
Prior to the implementation of this project, the computer literacy in our village was low. The village
not only lacked the infrastructure necessary to provide computer training programmes, but the
insufficient transportation services prevented them from accessing programmes conducted in the
towns. This placed our villagers, especially the youth, at a disadvantage when applying for
employment opportunities, as a basic knowledge of IT is a requirement in almost all technical
positions.
However, through our project, we are not only improving their accessibility to IT tools, but we are
helping them develop proficiency in the English language. These are services that would not have
been available to our villagers, had our programme not been initiated.

vogliamo finanziare persone bisognose che operano nei nostri stessi settori (coltivazione, allevamento, caseificazione, vendita prodotti alimentari artigianali) devolvendo parte del ricavato mensile del nostro distributore di latte crudo a Zibido San Giacomo (Milano).

we loan to help people who work in our same fields (agriculture, livestock, cheese production and direct selling, farmer's market) devolving monthly a part of the proceeds of our automatic machine which sells raw milk, in Zibido San Giacomo (Milan, Italy).

Nel cuore del Parco Agricolo Sud Milano, a Zibido San Giacomo, un’antica cascina ricca di storia, sapientemente restaurata, offre ai suoi visitatori prati coltivati con metodi attenti alla natura, prodotti a filiera corta ed una stalla dove le mucche sono felici!

In the Agricultural Park of Southern Milan, in Zibido San Giacomo, an old farmhouse rich of history and carefully restored, offers to its visitors fields cultivated with nature-friendly methods, goods sold directly to the pubblic and a barn where cows are happy!

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because:
Vision: 
1. To build a people business of public & private capital partners that have a natural attraction to people building sustainable communities. 

2. To provide families access to affordable housing and wealth building education & training. 

3. To build a scalable and profitable portfolio for team members and investors.
lenders.occupational_info:
"We are building a people business for people building a business...

Purpose:
1. To give a life of hope, happiness, and a helping hand to everyone that wants to experience the lifestyle of making a living...living their life in style.

2. To create perpetual streams of residual revenue to fund additional investment projects.

3. To help provide OPE-other people’s education, explanation, examples, and experiences of lower cost to start with proven ways for higher returns so every person has a chance or second chance to reach a financially free lifestyle in their lifetime.

Mission:
1. To help 1000 people times 1000 people build a strong financial freedom with multiple cash flows by 2020.

2. To help 1000 people each week to move money up to $$$ 3-figures to make money up to $$$,$$$ 6-figures cash flow as a group.

lenders.loan_because: Both of us have spent our entire careers in not- for- profit work. We have been blessed with good lives and know that God counts on people like us to share with others so they can have a good life too.
lenders.occupational_info:
Steve is a YMCA director.  Cheryl is a fundraiser for Catholic health care.
We have three children ages 24-30.  Two of them also work for non profits.  Together, we love sailing near our home in San Pedro, California. Cheryl loves to paint and write poetry.

lenders.loan_because: I care, and I believe in you.

lenders.name: Lucy

lenders.name: R  Times Media Group LLC
lenders.occupation: Producer of Food, Media, Merchandise, Publishing, Retail, and  other type of products.
lenders.loan_because:
We need to help each other in the world to succeed.

 There is enough hate and injustice in the world as it is everyday we have to fight to make a spot in a store or online to sell as the so called stimulus is no where in sight. 

So if we can help with small loans to our fellow businesses especially those in most need then we have achieved something worthwhile in our lives. Its to bad we have been so legislated to death in the US that most businesses that are started in overseas countries listed here can not be started here in the US thus preventing most individuals from benefiting from programs like this except under certain circumstances. 

But beware of the states and government as they are actively trying to take away what opportunities that technology provides. At least through KIVA we can do some good when we have the chance to be able to do. 

 We envy those who we are able to lend to on here versus not being able to do so as much here in the US with out such fear.
lenders.occupational_info:
A lot has changed in the 2 plus  years we have been on the KIVA program site, Some of it were for good reasons some of the changes were for bad reasons. Some for difficult and stupid reasons. But all the changes were for the opportunity for future growth and longevity. 

We have changed to reflect the changes in our business model, and the changes in the growth of our audience and readership. Plus the changes made after much review by experts and others in the media industry of our plans and goals for the next 50 years long after I am gone (one of the main founders) 

We make a products like our magazine, food products, stores/restaurants (Coming soon in 2016), and our new cook book being released in Feb. that was sorted of created by my grandmother and given to my mom who gave it to me. I cooked a number of those dishes for decades before being asked to create it into a product for the world to delight in. 

Never knowing there were opportunities all along that right there in front of my eyes was what I had been looking for in life all along. That instead of losing everything almost for helping someone we had technologies and ideas that were way better than what we had ever dreamed of having in our design box and development box. 

Lucky for us we (our team) has/have the talents to actually build and create these products like many featured on this site ourselves and do not have to go outside to get them built or completed running the risk of them being copied or stolen or being prayed upon in order to gain access to them. 

Sadly my Cancer and my Muscular Dystrophy *yes I have both issues to deal with) just to name a few of the illnesses that have hit us and have taken most of my ability to do this on my own so we must rely on those who have taught through unbelievable obstacles to keep the work going when everyone else wanted us to give up and just live with our health issues and call it a day. We have a 50 year business plan. With lots of options, ideas, technologies, concepts and more. 

More than enough to keep our people busy for the next 100  years and hopefully earning enough to live off of eventually and potentially help out thousands of people like those on here once they have the magazine business foundation completed at the end of 2015 or 2016 after being hit with all the obstacles we ran into in the past two plus years. 

We wish we had figured this out years ago, it might of saved us from being so lost for so many years in our desire to keep our ideas from being compromised and discriminated against due to health and other issues like income, and disabilities. 

We hope that our small loans on here in the future will save someone the same anguish we went through and give them a new life that will provide for them and their family.

We hope someday to teach people around the world to cook, grow food, open our stores and restaurants, build green houses, and lots more. Just a way of paying back a small portion of what god has given us in our life. Our readers will be hopefully traveling to various parts of the world to help build schools, orphanages, churches, and more in 2015, and beyond if you need something built in your country let us know our readers are always looking for opportunities to help out around the world Just let us know.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such a great opportunity to help others.  I'm honored to be a part of such a thoughtful group of lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I do 1 hour and 1.5 hour psychic readings and energy healings by phone.  My specialty is personal growth.  I live in Chicago, IL, United States.  I have clients that live all over the US and some that live in other countries as well.  I do NOT read the future.  I read a client's energy now, in the moment, and can also read one's past and past lives if it is helpful.  I am a psychic clairvoyant reader which means I close my eyes, see images, and interpret them.  I read one's aura, chakras, relationships, etc.  I am a conscious telepath so I can hear a client's angels and can tell the client what they say.  I can also help you to hear your own angels more over time.  I love my work because I love helping people to empower themselves and make desired changes in their lives.  I have lots of youtube videos and also guided meditation recordings available for download on my site.  I am very down-to-earth, so no previous experience or knowledge is required.  I also have a meditation blog and lots more info on my site.
